text: Anata gata wa minai ka. Arra wa kumo o kari, yagate sore o ai i-awase, sarani katamari ni sa re, yagate jiu ga, sonoaida kara furu no o. Mata hyo o fukumu, yama (no yona kumo) o ten kara kudashi, kare wa, okonomino-sha o sore de uchi, okonomino-sha o yoke rareru. Inazuma no hirameki wa, hontoni me o ubaou to suru
